titleStmt.title: A vvord to the aged. By Mr. Will. Bridge, sometime fellow of Emanuel Colledge in Cambridge, and late preacher of the Word of God at Yarmouth. I commend this to be reprinted as a profitable and serious discourse. James Allen.
titleStmt.author: Bridge, William, 1600?-1670.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Library of Congress, Washington, D.C.
